page.title: 01BOROUGHBRIDGE 1986
page.content: Boroughbridge was built around the bridge.It is a small modern town with quite alot of facilities.These include a modern Hypermarket and two schools. It also has lots of little shops,most of them are tourist shops. There are lots of estates in Boroughbridge because of this there has been an increase in the population .There is a leisure centre joined onto the High school with all the latest facilities,including a sports centre. The industry in Boroughbridge is built round the farming.There are also some little firms like sand and gravel pits and modern electronics. Boroughbridge is a tourist town ,it has plenty of hotels and guest houses,caravan and camping sites.
